sub_title: Transformational Music Producer / Sound Engineer / DJ | I create transformative music and experiences for personal healing, brands, events and artists.
summary:
Transformative music producer, frequency expert and event organizer.

Specialties: corporate and personal music and audio production, remixing, mixing, mastering, consultancy, demo coaching.

Team work, common goal, working hard, loving music, creating, developing, learning, teaching, travel, nature, sports, spirituality, family and friends.

Below you can check out a small portfolio of the music and audio production I have done:

My clients include: SFX, ID&T, Sensation, Diesel, Heineken, Bols, Vodafone, Mysteryland, Massive Music, Oxford House, Gogo Tours, X-Travel, Toyota, Tsuyamote, Sharp.

Do you need audio / music for your brand or event? Mail to info@leomakesmusic.io or checkout my portfolio at https://www.leomakesmusic.io

treasury_media.title: Kristina Fidelskaya presents Sensation Dubai: The Desert Dome - Line up trailer
treasury_media.description:
LEO created music and audio for Sensation Dubai. 
- It's finally here! Kristina Fidelskaya presents Sensation Dubai 2016 announces its full lineup of artists for the special edition of 'Fashion meets music' for their biggest outdoor edition yet at the Bab al Shams Event Arena. Six world class artists...

Register for pre-sale access to the best price tickets: www.ElectricZooFestival.com/wild Follow Electric Zoo NY for the latest news and details: http://www.facebook.com/ElectricZoo http://twitter.com/ElectricZooNY http://instagram.com/ElectricZooNY

treasury_media.title: Electric Zoo: Transformed | Official Aftermovie
treasury_media.description:
LEO did music & sound design for the official Electric Zoo Festival Aftermovie 2015 NYC. With the new edition coming up I'm very proud and excited to be a part of this love fulled festival and everyone involved who did such a great job on this one
The official aftermovie of Electric Zoo: Transformed 2015. Visit www.ElectricZooFestival.com to sign up for 2016 information.

certifications.name: Sound Design & Composition for the media

projects.title: Sensing Shamanism
projects.description:
I went to Peru to record Icaros (ancient healing songs) with the Shipibo tribe and remixed them.
The Sensing Shamanism album is the result of these remixes and is available as a donation based download. 

Make a Donation by following the link below and DOWNLOAD THE ALBUM!

All proceeds of the album will be donated to various organisations that preserve shamanic culture in Peru and worldwide.

To find out more about the project or download the album:
www.sensingshamanism.com

contributors.headline: Transformational Music Producer / Sound Engineer / DJ | I create transformative music and experiences for personal healing, brands, events and artists.

profile_positions.description:
We are a music & audio production company based in Amsterdam and Berlin that provides sound for all kinds of media and brands worldwide.
We work with a dedicated team of musicians, producers, voiceover talents and artists to provide our clients with the perfect soundtrack for their event, commercial, influencer's activation, 3d mapping, film or documentay.
profile_positions.title: Music Producer, Sound Designer

profile_positions.description:
Being trained as a sound designer at the HKU Utrecht and working both as a freelancer and in groups, Dj-ing and releasing records in both the underground and commercial scene, Leo is a music man of all traits.

MUSIC PRODUCTION
Having created music and audio for a wide range of brands, events and organizations he is inspired and dedicated to deliver a special sonic impression for every single job. Wether it’s creating a massive stadium vibe or a very intimate piece of music. (clients include Sensation,Heineken, Welcome to the Future, Mysteryland, Vodafone and Triumph)
profile_positions.title: Owner
DJ, Producer, Remixer, Frequency Wizard, 432 Hz

profile_positions.description:
*working as a dj / producer / remixer
*producing music and audio for media and events
*providing classes in Ableton Live / Logic / Mixing and studio techniques
*finalizing tracks for bands / producers and dj's
*providing music for commercials / events and media.
*giving seminars about music production and 432hz, the healing frequency
profile_positions.title: DJ / Producer / Remixer / Teacher
